entry.title: WIND WARNING , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 2:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: SE 50 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 110 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 110 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 this evening then west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
